languages.text: {n}Группа сервиторов со странно синхронными движениями упирает немигающие взгляды в огромного пленника. Вы без слов узнаете Номос, пожаловавших на допрос.{/n}

{n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Группа сервиторов со странно синхронными движениями упирает немигающие взгляды в огромного пленника. Вы без слов узнаете Номос, пожаловавших на допрос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

traits.locale_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}サーヴィター達はうさんくさいほどに揃った動きで、そびえ立つ囚人を見つめる。話しているのを聞かなくてもそれとわかるノモスは、尋問に立ち会うのが適切だと考えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィター達はうさんくさいほどに揃った動きで、そびえ立つ囚人を見つめる。話しているのを聞かなくてもそれとわかるノモスは、尋問に立ち会うのが適切だと考えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}这群机仆的动作出奇地同步，他们的目光聚焦在那位身材高大的囚犯身上。你不需要听到他们说话也能认出那是诺莫斯，它认为自己应该出席这场审讯。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这群奴工的动作出奇地同步，他们的目光聚焦在那位身材高大的囚犯身上。你不需要听到他们说话也能认出那是诺莫斯，它认为自己应该出席这场审讯。{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Die Gruppe von Servitoren, deren Bewegungen verdächtig synchron ablaufen, starrt den riesigen Gefangenen an. Du musst sie nicht sprechen hören, um Nomos zu erkennen, der entschieden hat, dem Verhör beizuwohnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gruppe von Servitoren, deren Bewegungen verdächtig synchron ablaufen, starrt den riesigen Gefangenen an. Du musst sie nicht sprechen hören, um Nomos zu erkennen, der entschieden hat, dem Verhör beizuwohnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Le groupe de servitors, dont les mouvements sont étrangement coordonnés, regarde fixement l'imposant prisonnier. Sans avoir besoin de les entendre prononcer le moindre mot, vous reconnaissez Nomos, qui a jugé bon d'assister à l'interrogatoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le groupe de servitors, dont les mouvements sont étrangement coordonnés, regarde fixement l'imposant prisonnier. Sans avoir besoin de les entendre prononcer le moindre mot, vous reconnaissez Nomos, qui a jugé bon d'assister à l'interrogatoire.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}El grupo de servidores, cuyos movimientos están sospechosamente bien sincronizados, observa detenidamente al gigantesco prisionero. No te hace falta oírles hablar para reconocer en ellos a Nomos, que ha considerado oportuno asistir al interrogatorio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El grupo de servidores, cuyos movimientos están sospechosamente bien sincronizados, observa detenidamente al gigantesco prisionero. No te hace falta oírles hablar para reconocer en ellos a Nomos, que ha considerado oportuno asistir al interrogatorio.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1

languages.text: {n}Hareketleri şüphe uyandıracak derecede senkronik bir grup hizmetör, kapı gibi duran mahkûma bakıyor. Sorguya katılmayı uygun gören Nomos'u, seslerini duymadan tanıyabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors, whose movements are suspiciously well synchronised, stares at the towering prisoner. You do not need to hear them speak to recognise Nomos, who has seen fit to attend the interrogation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hareketleri şüphe uyandıracak derecede senkronik bir grup hizmetör, kapı gibi duran mahkûma bakıyor. Nomos'u tanımak için konuşmalarını duymana gerek yok... Nomos sorguya katılmaya uygun görülmüştü.{/n}
traits.speaker: NomosServitor_V1
